description: Sadly Cowboy Sahib does not appear on the inside of this issue.
The introducton of Cowboy Sahib

For some reason, after an 18 month hiatus, when ACG restarted The Hooded Horseman, they called that issue # 18 and then continued from there meaning there was another # 21 & 22, which has caused some confusion among collectors.

This is the order they came out
Please notice that the Union Soldier's uniform is indeed green!
Reprints Wolverine #48-69.
name: Volume 3

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

description:
1. Captives of Space (written by Gaylord DuBois)

2. Lost in Space (puzzle and activity page)

3. What's the Weather Puzzler (puzzle and activity page)
name: Space Family Robinson : Lost in Space
Edgar Rice Burroughs Tarzan : Trapped by the Leopard Men

description: "Deathtrap" part 2 of 5! After attempting to kill Cyborg, Vigilante has been locked up by the Titans. But Vigilante knows that there is a traitor in their midst, and he will use any means necessary to bring Jericho to justice Even if that means killing all of the Titans to do it
name: Deathtrap Part 2

description: In next month's Terminator Salvation movie, the fight against Skynet enters its latest phase, post-Judgment Day! Get a first look at John Connor's battle here in this teaser issue featuring 22 pages of Terminator action illustrated by Transformers artist, supreme Don Figueroa, who also provides multiple covers for this T-taster.
name: Movie Adaptation

description: It seems there was no Buffalo Bill # 1 in this series, with it starting at # 2

The Runaway Rocket - Rocket Riley

Treasure of Death - Hurricane Hart

Origin of Red Roberts, the Electro Man - Red Roberts

Devil's Gulch - The Phantom Ranger

The Coming of the Steel Shark - The Steel Shark

Facts You May Not Know

Hell in the Heavens - Buzzard Barnes

Traitors Must Die - Lefty Larsen
name: Rocket Riley Prince of Planets

description:
The Runaway Rocket : Part 2 - Rocket Riley

Pearls of Death - Hurricane Hart

Within The Law - Phantom Ranger

The Opium Smugglers - Red Roberts

Pursuit of the Steel Shark - Steel Shark

Wolf in the Fold - Buzzard Barnes

The Man with a Thousand Faces - Defender

Handcuffed to Death - Skyfighters
name: The Runaway Rocket: Part 2

description:
The Runaway Rocket : Part 3 - Rocket Riley

Pirate Plunder - Hurricane Hart

The Auto Thieves - Defender

The Dawson Kidnapping - Red Roberts

The Gold Shipment Grab - Steel Shark

The Treasure of Don

The Letter That Branded a Killer - Buzzard Barnes

The Masked Terror - Phantom Ranger
name: The Runaway Rocket: Part 3

description: The latest Badlands disappearance is a local woman who may still be alive. While Scully pursues the presumed abductor and escaped serial killer known as "Dante," Mulder explores the Hollow Earth an underground realm of caves and tunnels with no small resemblance to Hell. Will he find the missing woman? Or will Dante reach her first? And what happens if the demons Dante claims haunt him turn out to be real.
name: Dante's Muse Part II: Netherworld

description: This special zero issue features Bluewater's favorite swashbuckler! Hanna has pillaged and plundered to the top of her profession. But has success caught up with her? Now a bounty is on her head with every cutthroat scallywag aiming to collect. Will she keep her head - or lose it like her father before her?

Fifteen men on a dead man's chest. But in this story, the men happen to be zombies, and they sail with the most blood thirsty female pirate on the Spanish Main. Hanna the pirate continues her quest to find her notorious father Blackbeard, and runs into a dead end!

Trapped on the island with her crew, cornered by a vengeful sea god, Hanna will have to use all of her wits to escape! Add to this Captain Purloin has finally caught up with her. Can she survive what is about to come down upon her? Was her trusting of the young island survivor Robbie Buckle her undoing, even if it had led her to more treasure than she had ever seen?

In the vast Star Trek universe, many diverse alien races abound, and now they finally get their due! Continuing a series of one-shots, each by a different creative team and featuring a different Star Trek alien race. Now, the spotlight shines on the Andorians. In the issue written by Paul Storrie, Andorian Ortees Shared, a Commander in Starfleet Intelligence, returns to his homeworld while on leave and finds himself in the midst of mistrust and deception, and is captured by a renegade commander of the "True Heirs of Andor."
name: The Old Ways

description: The female of the species is deadlier than the male"a statement that was never more true than in the case of the Orion Animal Women, infamous from the very first episode of STAR TREK, "The Cage"! It's a fact Fleet Captain Christopher Pike will soon discover, as he's caught up in a web of intergalactic criminal intrigue. Can Pike trust the beautiful Orion slave girland can he trust himself around her?
name: Orions

description: As Kirk and the crew investigate the disappearance of the USS Pasteur, a trail of debris leads the USS Enterprise to an automated facility on a lifeless, desert planet in the Gobi system. A landing party finds robotic nannies caring for a computer-controlled nursery of alien babieswhich Dr. McCoy's analysis proves to be the final survivors of the planet's dead civilization. But when an ensign disappears, and clues of the Pasteur's fate uncover the facility's startling secret, the computer reveals it maternal instinctsusing its awesome power to defend its childrenendangering the Enterprise, and forcing Kirk and the landing party to fight for their lives.

A sequel to the classic episode "The Enterprise Incident"originally written by Fontana herselfwhere Kirk and Spock found themselves trapped on an Enterprise out of phase with space itself and facing a plot of revenge from Romulans!
name: Part 1

volume.name: Star Trek Year Four: The Enterprise Experiment

description: The Story: The Bowery, 1937. Jim Logan, the fiercest knife expert in New York, runs a seedy detective agency called "LOGAN & LOGAN"...along with his useless, halfwit brother, Dog. They're the best they are at what they do. But when a swanky dame named Mariko Yashida struts into the office, she opens up a world of hurt for Logan, forcing him to revisit his painful, bloody past. The latest in the Marvel Noir series, WOLVERINE NOIR reunites the acclaimed WOLVERINE team of Stuart Moore (IRON MAN) and C.P. Smith (The Programme).
name: I: Jack Roller

description: The frenzied finale to the 1st story arc! With his prize in sight, Plissken must confront all his enemies! But beware, because this cornered Snake is full of venom!

This one shot features a brand new story called THE DAME! Private eye Frank Wood (Vincent Price) takes on a case in which he must track down a wealthy husband's beloved missing wife. As Frank investigates the case further, he realizes the client is hiding a major secret about his wife. A deadly secret.
name: The Dame

description:
Overview:

"The Ancient of Days" is the last of her kind -- a winged sauroid with powerful telepathic abilities. Her race, the Mahar, once ruled the sacred city of Pellucidar from on high, until they fell so low that they could no longer survive let alone maintain control of the natives. Now, as Tarzan seeks to rid the ancient jungle city of an invading band of Predators, this Mahar sees an opportunity for the sauroids to rule again -- an opportunity for her to take control of Pellucidar. It's just a matter of playing one side against the other . . . a very small matter for such a powerful telepath.
name: The Law of the Jungle

volume.name: Tarzan vs. Predator at the Earth's Core

description: Christopher Grahame is a successful children's author currently working on the sequel to Lewis Carrol's "Alice" novels. Lately, he's been sufferring under the pressure and the terrible migraines and blackouts he suffered as a child have returned transporting him back to the magical land he created in his youth. Many things have changed since his last visit as an ill child. The happy fairytale is now plagued with the darkness and suffering of war and his old pals are not as he remembered.
name: Chapter One

description: "The Resistance" is trying to fight back the invasion of the Terminators. During the battle, most of their city has been wiped out by war. During the fight, the resistance captures a Terminator upon the orders of John Connor.
name: Before the Rise (01 of 02)

description:
The resistance moves to Venice.

Despite their every urge to destroy the Terminator that killed so many of their troops, they are instead trying to do the unthinkable--turn the heartless killing machine into something that they call a friend.
name: Before the Rise (02 of 02)

description:
The war with the machines is about to begin, and John Connor has disappeared.

Hoping to weaken John's chances of leading a successful resistance against the coming Rule of the Machines, Skynet sends back its most powerful and efficient killing machine to date--the T-X. Its mission is to track down and kill anyone who will be important to John's future.

But first, the T-X must prove that it's up to the task...
name: Eyes of the Rise (01 of 02)

description:
Skynet has sent back a T-X to find and kill John Connor, mankinds last hope for survival in the coming war with the machines.

John's only hope is a single Terminator. But his protector is an outdated model, without the onboard weapons that is standard issue on a T-X.

Involved in a deadly pursuit, John knows that even with a Terminator at this side, his chances of survival diminish every second they stay on the run.

For the T-X, John's death is only a matter of time.
name: Eyes of the Rise (02 of 02)

description: Skynet has sent another model of Terminator to take care of John Connor. John also has another model sent to protect him in his quest.
name: Fragmented (01 of 02)

description:
From the diary of John Connor,

So there I was kidnapped by a Terminator. My only hope for rescue all but destroyed in a blazing inferno behind me.

Where were we going? What was going to happen to me?

My only hope was that my protector would reach me before I found out.
name: Fragmented (02 of 02)
A Tragedy of Twins

description: Danger Girl: 3D Special is basically the first Danger Girl issue but is made to be viewed with 3D glasses. It has the same characters, the same story but the panels are presented in 3D manner.
name: 3D Special

description: Christopher Grahame is a successful children's author currently working on the sequel to Lewis Carrol's "Alice" novels. Lately, he's been suffering under the pressure and the terrible migraines and blackouts he suffered as a child have returned transporting him back to the magical land he created in his youth. Many things have changed since his last visit as an ill child. The happy fairytale is now plagued with the darkness and suffering of war and his old pals are not as he remembered.
name: Chapter Two

description: Christopher Grahame is a successful children's author currently working on the sequel to Lewis Carrol's "Alice" novels. Lately, he's been suffering under the pressure and the terrible migraines and blackouts he suffered as a child have returned transporting him back to the magical land he created in his youth. Many things have changed since his last visit as an ill child. The happy fairytale is now plagued with the darkness and suffering of war and his old pals are not as he remembered.
name: Chapter Three

description: Christopher Grahame is a successful children's author currently working on the sequel to Lewis Carrol's "Alice" novels. Lately, he's been suffering under the pressure and the terrible migraines and blackouts he suffered as a child have returned transporting him back to the magical land he created in his youth. Many things have changed since his last visit as an ill child. The happy fairytale is now plagued with the darkness and suffering of war and his old pals are not as he remembered.
name: Chapter Four

description: The final mission of the Enterprise continues as the crew is caught in the middle of two bloody civil wars. With the Enterprise damaged, and everyone fighting for control of the Heart of God-the most powerful weapon in the known galaxy-will Kirk and Spock have the time to give their lost friend Doctor McCoy the memorial service he deserves?

While the comic started in Vol. 1 # 1 as Super Magic comics, with Vol.1 # 2 the title was changed to Super Magician Comics and remained such until its end with Vol. 5 # 7 (whole number 55) and featured the adventures of Blackstone the Magician based very loosely on the real stage magician of the time, along with other magical characters such as Ellis the Magician, Red Dragon and others, as well as featuring some of the most racist and jingoistic covers and stories of any comic in the 40s, and that took some doing.
name: Volume 1 Number 1

description: From the pulp magazines that inspired early comic book writers and artists, The Shadow, Doc Savage, Nick Carter, Bill Barnes and others made their comics debuts. The prolific Gibson wrote most of the Shadow pulps and comics - and hundreds of other stories.
name: Untitled

description: Last appearance of Doc Savage in Shadow Comics for a while, as when the next issue was released a Doc Savage comic had come out from Street and Smith.

name: Monstrodamus and His Creatures of Fable

description:
After appearing for 3 issue in the Shadow Comic Doc was given his own.

At first based on the pulp hero it was not long before they changed him to conform to the Doc Savage radio show which had a very short run and changed the character so that his aids were dropped and he was given superpowers by a hood with a gem in it that he found in Tibet and which lit him fly and throw power blasts!

After a time the old pulp Doc would return to the Shadow Comics after the end of this magazine.
name: v1 #1

description: The Klingons say: 'Four thousand throats may be cut in a single night by a running man.' But where does the saying come from? Kang-captain, husband, Dahar master-tells three different versions of the story at three key points in his life. Keith DeCandido, the best-selling author of Star Trek: A Burning House, teams up with Fallen Angel's J.K. Woodward to bring three glorious tales of revenge, battle, and honor!
name: Four Thousand Throats...

description: The quest for the 13 artifacts in the Top Cow Universe continues. Following the events of Broken Trinity come two new characters, two new stories and another chapter in the growing Witchblade saga. Michael Finnegan wrestles with the power and purpose that comes with the Glacier Stone, and his first test might be saving Darkness wielder Jackie Estacado from himself. Hundreds of miles away, Glorianna Silver suffers from her banishment at the hands of The Angelus, and in order to survive, she will have to embrace the power of the Ember Stone and the destiny it has for her.
name: Paying Debts; Lessons

description: Garona brings Twilight's Hammer down on the peace summit at Theramore, further setting back relations between the Horde and the Alliance. But all is not as it seems as mysterious outside forces continue to hatch a plan of disruption. Could someone possibly be secretly aligned with the Scourge?
name: Showdown!
Lost & Found
The World's Weirdest Tricks and Fantastic Stories
Search Mode
Judgment Impaired
Genesis & Revelations

description: This story is only 1/2 of the actual pages of this book. The other half is "Terminator 2: Nuclear Twilight #0". Each cover is on the flip-side of the actual issue or book itself.
name: No Fate

description: Reunited at last, our heroes - an aura-mage, a Rakshasa, a Grim Reaper, and a waitress assassin - join forces with some expected allies to try and halt the plans of the evil Princess Fan and her endless hordes of monster followers. Yet even their combined skills and might are not enough to forestall the inevitable apocalypse. With only hours left to live, they make the most of it in a night of introspection, confessions, true love, and broken hearts.

volume.name: Gold Digger/Ninja High School: Maidens Of Twilight

description: In 2005 Zenescope introduced the series that reinvented classic fables with a terrifying twist that has spawned close to 40 issues. Now be prepared for the most intense and frightening.... Aww who are we kidding? It's April Fools!! Join Red Riding Hood, Cinderella, Hansel and Gretel and others as they find themselves in very familiar positions but with some different problems than the first time around. We're giving you the alternate dialogue these characters never wanted you to read. The first ever April Fools' edition has arrived as Grimm Fairy Tales gets the Mystery Science Theater 3000 treatment. Warning: For immature audiences only!
name: Red Riding Ho; Hansel And Gretel 2: Electric Boogaloo; Reeferstiltskin; Jack And The Bromance

description: Spidey celebrates his 50th issue milestone in true super hero style with a surprise party unlike any other. Too bad the hosts of this little get together are some of the webbed wonder's fiercest foes! Will our hero be able to defeat the new Sinister Six in time to blow out his candles? Or will he just end up with a face full of cake and a body covered in bruises? Make a wish, Spidey... it may be your last!
name: Sinister Six(Teenth); Nightmare Commute!

description: 'ANT-MAN is On The JOB!!'-Well, he's LOOKING for a job, anyway...But his employment is put on hold when the insidious SANDMAN crosses his path-and ANT-MAN needs to pull out all the stops to defeat the Granular Goon! And, as ANT-MAN's popularity rises, so too do the suspicions of Vernon Van Dyne...!
name: On The Job

description: The mighty Thor battles one of his oldest and most powerful adversaries, Crusher Creel the Absorbing Man and his super-strong squeeze Titania. But this time the odinson does not fight alone. The Invincible Iron Man fights by his side. Plus, the secrets as to why Thor's hammer has been acting strange of late begin to be revealed in this very issue.
name: Hammer Time
